def minimum_chocolates(nums):
    ans = float('inf')
    n = len(nums)
    for i in range(n):
        curr = i
        curr -= max(0, n - i - nums[i])
        ans = min(ans, curr)
    return ans

def minimum_chocolates(nums):
    ans = float('inf')
    n = len(nums)
    for i in range(n):
        curr = i
        curr += max(0, n - i + nums[i])
        ans = min(ans, curr)
    return ans

def minimum_chocolates(nums):
    ans = float('inf')
    n = len(nums)
    for i in range(n):
        curr = i
        curr += max(0, (n - i) * nums[i])
        ans = min(ans, curr)
    return ans

def minimum_chocolates(nums):
    ans = float('inf')
    n = len(nums)
    for i in range(n):
        curr = i
        curr += max(0, n + i - nums[i])
        ans = min(ans, curr)
    return ans

def minimum_chocolates(nums):
    ans = float('inf')
    n = len(nums)
    for i in range(n):
        curr = i
        curr += max(0, n * i - nums[i])
        ans = min(ans, curr)
    return ans
